actions.text: On agreeing to the Herrera Beutler amendment (A071) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment (A071) offered by Ms. Herrera Beutler to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A071) offered by Ms. Herrera Beutler to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Herrera Beutler amendment (A071) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

amends_amendment.description: Amendment consists of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32, as amended, and which was made in order pursuant to H. Res. 507.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32 which shall be considered as pending.

description: Amendment allows all 50 States to compete for bus and bus facility funding by eliminating the 7-state set aside High Density Bus program and transferring the funds to the nationwide Competitive Bus Grants.
purpose: An amendment No. 57 printed in Part A of House Report 114-326 to allow all 50 states to compete for bus and bus facility funding by eliminating the 7-state set aside High Density Bus program and transferring the funds to the nationwide Competitive Bus Grants, Sec. 5339(d).
